decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.containers

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.containers.Container
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<ContainedItem>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Inventory

    public class Container
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<ContainedItem>
    An item container for world entities. The Inventory class extends this to implement the player inventory. Created by bjwood on 18/08/2014.

                 int amount)
        Attempts to remove an item this container
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be removed
        amount - The amount of the item to be removed
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise (eg. strange voodoo)

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem(PlayerItem item,
              int amount)
        Checks if the container contains the given item in at least the quantity given
        Parameters:
        item - The item to check
        amount - The amount required
        Returns:
        True if the container has that many of the item, false otherwise
